html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) - Amazon Web Services:

  • AWS SAYS ROOT CAUSE OF ISSUES CAUSING API ERROR RATES IN US-EAST-1 REGION IS AN IMPAIRMENT OF SEVERAL NETWORK DEVICES - STATUS PAGE

  • AWS SAYS SERVICES IMPACTED INCLUDE: EC2, CONNECT, DYNAMODB, GLUE, ATHENA, TIMESTREAM, AND CHIME AND OTHER AWS SERVICES IN US-EAST-1 - STATUS PAGE

  • AWS SAYS PURSUING MULTIPLE MITIGATION PATHS IN PARALLEL; HAVE SEEN SOME SIGNS OF RECOVERY, BUT DO NOT HAVE AN ETA FOR FULL RECOVERY AT THIS TIME

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
